string.text: Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
Ha ha! I'm glad you are here, stalker. I know a man who could use your help. See if you can be of assistance to him.
Good luck stalker.
Retrieve PDA for Beard
Beard has a PDA stashed away that contains some dirt on Owl.

Haha! Look who it is! Well, my friend, have I got the deal for you! That prick Owl thinks he can shut me down but I know a little something about him. There is a PDA I have stashed away that has everything I need to put him in his place. Bring it to me, stalker. I will make it worth your while.
Ha! You got it! Good man, stalker! Here, have a drink on me!
Stalker Search and Rescue
Monolith have captured a stalker. Find him and rescue him.
Stalker, Monolith bitches have captured one of your comrades. They headed off in that direction. Save him!
Haha! Look at the pair of you, hard to tell who lost the fight, haha! Come, come, drink up! Have some vodka and feel no more pain!
Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
If ya ain't bringin' me no dead mutants there ain't nothing we got to talk about. Better keep on walking.
Good luck stalker.
Find %s for Noah's Dog
Noah's mutant pet is hungry for %s. Better find some soon before it turns on the old coot.
Where the hell you been boy? I'm out of dog food! This little bitch is gonna eat me out of house and home. She's a looker though, ain't she? Just like her master.
Well what the hell you standing there for? Get me some damn %s to feed my dog!
About damn time! Here you go, girl. Eat up. She's such a pretty lass. Look how full that coat is... What? You still here? Here, take this if it will get you to go away.
Exterminate Noah's Mutant Infestation
The old coot Noah is having trouble keeping the area clear of mutants. Help the old guy out.
You're late! There's mutants everywhere out here! You expect me to keep killing them all? Get the hell out there and get rid of them damn things!

You've been gone all day! How the hell long does it take to kill a couple damn mutants? Take your damn pay and get the hell off my boat. And pet my dog on the way out will you? She loves attention and stalker fingers.
Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
I have a customer for you. I've marked his location on your map.
Good luck.
Trace the Emergency Signal ($freq MHz)
Vector wants you to trace the emergency signal sent by a group of mercs
Vector wants you to trace the emergency signal sent by a group of mercs, but $item_1 is required to search.
Vector wants you to trace the emergency signal sent by a group of mercs.\nHead over to $map.
Vector wants you to trace the emergency signal sent by a group of mercs.\nUse the $item_1 and set up the frequency to $freq MHz. Search for a good signal around.
You must retrieve the $item_2 you found and show it to Vector.
Go back to Vector with your findings.

A bit late, but I'm glad you're here. We were finishing our business last time, until I recieved an emergency signal coming from the south. I can't mistake this one, it's coming from the PDA that belongs to one of the men I sent yesterday to our base in the other side of the Zone. Something went wrong, so I need you to trace their signal by using an RF receiver and find what happened. You must bring the PDA too, It contains sensetive information.
So they all dead? What a shame... You brought the PDA back at least. Here's your reward.
Secure the Passage to the Outskirts
Vector wants you to go inside Jupiter Underground, and eliminate the monolith squad hiding in there.

Bad news, and this time it's the fucking monolith. The underground network between Jupiter and Outskirts has been used for while by our squads. That's how we carry operations inside the Outskirts of Pripyat while avoiding contact with the fanatics above. But just when you thought that business is good, the last mercs who went there have been ambushed by a monolith squad out of no where, as if the mutants are not enough already. I need a brave man like you to get rid of them and secure the passage. We can't let them lurk there.
Splendid work! We are back to business. Here, for your trouble.
Clear area of mutants
Mutants are about. Hunt them down and clear the area.
Shh... Listen, hear that? Some mutants howling. Still gives me the chills after all this time. How about you go out there and take care of them? I'll make it worth your while.
Haha! Well done, stalker! Have a drink on Beard!
Find the "%s" Artefact for Beard
Beard wants you to find the "%s" artefact for him.
I deal in artefacts. I usually don't buy them from stalkers, but there is one in particular I would like to get my hands on. Do you want to try to get it for me?
I'm looking for the "%s" artefact. You ever seen one? If you can find it, I'll make sure you're well paid.
Good hunting, stalker! Have a drink on the house!
My Brother's Keeper
Kill the Military Stalker

There's a guy; used to be a regular stalker just like anyone else on this ship. One day, some Military officers came and offered him a commission. The next thing we knew, he's found murdering his former brothers in cold blood! We cannot stand for that! Find this traitor and avenge the men he shot in the back.
Ah, you killed him? Help yourself to a drink. I'm sure we could all do with one...
Find %s for Cardan
%s are required by Cardan to install basic equipment upgrades. You should bring them back to him if you find any.
Not only do I need some more booze, but I could really use a good set of tools, stalker. If you're interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I need.
I need a set of basic tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Great, stalker. You brought exactly what I've asked. Thanks.
Find %s for Cardan
%s are required by Cardan to install advanced equipment upgrades. You should bring them back to him if you find any.
I could really use more tools and vodka... but the vodka is easy to find. What I need from you is more tools; better tools. Can you do this for me?
I need a set of advanced tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Fantastic! Feel free to stop by any time for a drink or if you need me to take a look at your gear.

Benefactor: get in the teleporter anomaly on the hill
Benefactor: clear out the mutant lair
Benefactor: tell Noah about the successful mission
Snorks have been threatening Noah for a while. He wants me to clear out a lair at the southern plateau.
Benefactor: help Noah get a new rifle
Benefactor: bring Noah an Armsel Protecta
Noah wants my help getting an Armsel Protecta so that he can rest easy at night.
Collect %s
A mercenary has asked me to collect %s.
You feel like arranging a real safari? You will hunt people and bring their patches. We will be raising the standards of the faction.
You feel like arranging a real safari? Bring me %s and I'll pay you well. We will be raising the standards of the faction.
That's what I'm talking about! Here's your money.
Find %s for the Mercenary mechanic in Zaton
A mercenary technician has asked me to bring him %s.

Listen, what kind of mercenaries are we without well-maintained and custom equipment? You know, we used to have tools for anything, but some fuck stole them from the substation workshop. So, I need tools, and not shitty ones either. Can you find us some?

Listen, what kind of mercenaries are we without well-maintained and custom equipment? You know, we used to have tools for anything, but some fuck stole them from the substation workshop. So, I need tools, and not shitty ones either. Can you find us some?
Damn, you deserve a discount. Thanks.
Find %s for the Mercenary mechanic in Zaton
A mercenary technician has asked me to bring him %s.
Having reliable weapons is nice, but so far we're without any sufficient upgrades. Will you find me an even better set of tools?
Having reliable weapons is nice, but so far we're without any sufficient upgrades. Will you find me an even better set of tools?
Thank you. Let's see how much I can help you and the others out with this!
Find %s for the Mercenary mechanic in Zaton
A mercenary technician has asked me to bring him %s.
Listen - let's finish our job, shall we? I need calibration tools to make sure that no scumbag escapes us.
Listen - let's finish our job, shall we? I need calibration tools to make sure that no scumbag escapes us.
Oh, fuck... You are the hero of every technician! Well done indeed... I'll be doubling your discount.
Find %s for Axel
%s is required by Axel to work on medical supplies. You should bring them back to him if you find any.

Maintaining what's left from medical supplies storage with this number of injuries I have to treat on daily basis is worrying. I'm gonna run out of bandages and medkits soon or later. I need you to find me one of those old drug-making kits. They will come in handy for sure.

There is. I've been looking all over for a %s. It should contain some tablets and ampoules I need to do work on medical supplies. I'll pay you for one of these kits if you can bring a full set back to me.
Great job! I own you big time.
Find %s for Spleen
%s are required by Spleen to install basic equipment upgrades. You should bring them back to him if you find any.
The stalkers that come through here always need upgrades and repairs, but I need some new equipment if I want to keep helping.
A set of basic tools is the first thing I need if I want to keep doing business here.
Great, stalker. You brought exactly what I've asked. Thanks.
